com.ibm.util.merge.storage

Class Archive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.util.merge.storage.Archive
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GzipArchive, JarArchive, TarArchive, ZipArchive

    public abstract class Archive
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for output archives.
    Author:
    Mike Storey
